article_metadata.description: On March 23, 2010, President Obama signed into law the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act, or as it's affectionately or derisively known, depending on your point of view, Obamacare. Following two years of contentious litigation, the Supreme Court ultimately blessed Obamacare in June 2012, but strange as it may sound, the [...]
